name: minitest
description: Small, copy-paste-able e2e testing in JavaScript and TypeScript supporting SPA navigation, clicking, checking if things exist, etc.

scripts.build: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc MiniTest.ts && ./node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js MiniTest.js > MiniTest.min.js && node utils/makeMiniTestBlob.js && ./node_modules/minify/bin/minify.js MiniTest.blob-working.js > MiniTest.blob.js && npm run buildCleanup
scripts.buildTests: npm run build && npm run updateTests

author: Cory Leigh Rahman
